projects.title: UT Marketplace
projects.description: Web3 marketplace for selling UNIQs (NFTs) on the Ultra blockchain.
projects.longDescription: UT Marketplace is a Web3 marketplace dedicated to selling UNIQs (NFTs) on the Ultra blockchain. It features an advanced marketplace section as well as dedicated spaces for collections, transactions and statistics to track sales performance. The application is connected to the Ultra blockchain with wallet integration and transaction processing. A multilingual system is included. MVP developed as part of a fundraising round in collaboration with Ultra Times.
challenges: Ultra wallet integration and transaction reliability
solutions: Ultra Wallet SDK/extension usage and error state management
Clear data schema and reusable components

projects.title: HR Request V2
projects.description: New HR application to automate and modernize onboarding processes.
projects.longDescription: Complete overhaul of the HR application to simplify and automate tasks related to employee onboarding (regardless of status). Significant gains in productivity and efficiency for the HR team.
features: Automatic management of medical and security checks
solutions: Granular RBAC on API and UI side

projects.title: GPCM V2
projects.description: Migration to NestJS to accelerate and modernize the GPCM app.
projects.longDescription: Backend migration from PHP (CodeIgniter) to Node (NestJS) to boost speed and responsiveness. New features, improved design and new data architecture adapted to business needs (PC maintenance and tickets). QR code access.

projects.title: Ultra Meetup
projects.description: Website listing Ultra / Ultra Times community events.
projects.longDescription: Showcase website to reference meetups and events from the Ultra and Ultra Times community.

projects.title: Table Tennis Match Tracking App
projects.description: Mobile app for tracking ping-pong scores with voice announcements.
projects.longDescription: Mobile app for tracking ping-pong match scores, with tracking system and voice announcements. Project created for a Secret Santa and to improve score management.

projects.title: The Battle of Expressions
projects.description: Fun web game to measure affinity with FR/CA expressions.
projects.longDescription: Web game in 10 rounds with Framer Motion animations, responsive design and shareable results. Created as a Secret Santa gift.

projects.title: Ultra Dashboard
projects.description: Dashboard around the Ultra blockchain and $UOS token.
projects.longDescription: Price tracking, technical indicators, key info and project-related articles. Integration of CEX APIs and Ultra Times website.

projects.title: GPCM - Maintenance Application
projects.description: PC maintenance management with GLPI sync and ticket tracking.
projects.longDescription: Main project in Bachelor at CESI. Remote computer management (ghost/software updates, troubleshooting), bidirectional GLPI sync, improved ticket tracking.

projects.title: Ultra Wallet Tracker
projects.description: Tracking the number of wallets created on the Ultra blockchain.
projects.longDescription: Simple application to track wallet creation on Ultra in real-time.

projects.title: FED - Business Application
projects.description: Digital tracking of emergence forms (accessibility, optimization, maintenance).
projects.longDescription: Tool for tracking digitized emergence forms, with accessibility module, optimizations and maintenance.

projects.title: Flux Tools - Business Application
projects.description: QR code app for bin collection and automated emails.
projects.longDescription: Application for agents responsible for bin collection with QR code and automated emails.

projects.title: Gacha Game
projects.description: Gacha game (cats) with combat and rewards, created in group at CESI.
projects.longDescription: Creation of a cat gacha game with DALL·E for images, combat system and rewards. One week work.

projects.title: Fire Permit - Business Application
projects.description: Fire permit requests for agents, improved security.
projects.longDescription: Fire permit request application with optimizations, maintenance and V2.

projects.title: HR Requests - Business Application
projects.description: HR request management and automated emails.
projects.longDescription: HR app to manage various requests with automated email sending.

projects.title: Secret Santa
projects.description: Secret Santa matching app with blacklist and auto emails.
projects.longDescription: Python/Flask project with HTML5, SCSS and JavaScript. Blacklist management and automated emails.

projects.title: Supplies - Business Application
projects.description: Internal warehouse order and stock management.
projects.longDescription: Internal app for orders and stocks, with pagination, sorting and maintenance.

projects.title: OZC Signage Commercial Website
projects.description: Signage merchant site for individuals and professionals.
projects.longDescription: E-commerce site for signage sales across France.

projects.title: French Sticker Commercial Website
projects.description: E-commerce site for decorative panels.
projects.longDescription: Site for decorative panel sales (B2C).

projects.title: OZC Institutional Website
projects.description: Institutional website highlighting services and activities.
projects.longDescription: Company showcase website with contact conversion focus.

projects.title: OZC Layout Showcase Website
projects.description: Showcase website for layout and construction activity.
projects.longDescription: Presentation of layout services and achievements.

projects.title: Manage Transport Showcase Website
projects.description: Showcase website presenting a carrier's services. Complete Next.js redesign in 2025.
projects.longDescription: Simple site to present services and contact. Second work period in 2025: complete redesign with my Next.js stack (App Router, TypeScript, Tailwind), performance/SEO optimizations, accessibility and UX (May-June 2025).

projects.title: UT Quest
projects.description: Web3 quest MVP to boost the Ultra ecosystem (social and in-game engagement).
projects.longDescription: UT Quest is a Web3 quest project aimed at boosting the Ultra ecosystem and its blockchain by engaging players through social, in-game and more activities. The version developed here is a functional MVP, connected to the blockchain for various actions, including Ultra wallet connection via the Ultra Wallet extension and quest creation for different games. Any authorized person can manage their games and their own quests from an admin dashboard. Project developed as part of a fundraising round.
solutions: RBAC on API and UI side

projects.title: OZC Web
projects.description: Showcase website for Osmoz Communication agency's web/digital services.
projects.longDescription: Showcase website presenting Osmoz Communication agency's web and digital offering. Focus on offer clarity, service highlighting and simple contact journey. Project associated with DigitalLabs TM.
solutions: Clean and effective UI aligned with identity

projects.title: UT Launchpad
projects.description: UNIQ (NFT) launch platform to boost the Ultra blockchain.
projects.longDescription: UT Launchpad was created to generate activity on the Ultra blockchain through UNIQ (NFT) collection launches. The platform aims to become the first launchpad in the Ultra ecosystem and introduces the Phygital concept: an UNIQ can be burned in exchange for its physical equivalent printed on dibond. This MVP was developed as part of Ultra Times' fundraising round.
features: Connection and participation via Ultra Wallet
challenges: Ultra blockchain integration and transaction reliability
solutions: Ultra Wallet SDK/extension with error state management

projects.title: UT Snapshot
projects.description: Snapshot tool to identify UNIQ holders on the Ultra blockchain.
projects.longDescription: UT Snapshot allows taking snapshots of the Ultra network to identify holders of specific UNIQs. The tool provides a clear and up-to-date view of asset distribution, facilitating analysis of ownership patterns and engagement tracking in the Ultra ecosystem. MVP developed as part of Ultra Times' fundraising round.

projects.title: WeNeedU
projects.description: Web3 freelance platform for missions/services in the Ultra ecosystem.
projects.longDescription: WeNeedU is a Web3 freelance platform, inspired by the Fiverr model, dedicated to missions and services within the Ultra blockchain ecosystem. It connects talents with opportunities related to the Ultra platform, affiliated entities, games and projects, allowing creators, developers and professionals to offer their skills for crypto payments. Designed to foster collaboration and accelerate project development, WeNeedU aims to become the reference marketplace for on-demand expertise in the Ultra ecosystem. MVP developed as part of Ultra Times' fundraising round.
challenges: Offer, profile and order flow modeling
Smooth user experience on complex journeys
solutions: Robust status and error management on Web3 side
Structured data schema and reusable components
